en.Title: Simple, transparent pricing
en.description: Simple choose your plan and apply

pricingCard.point: payment to your mobile money account daily

USSD.point: Installation charge depend to your need

Lists: Collect payments from any type of phones without internet
No development required for standard menu
Starting using your personalized merchant code same day
Retrieve all customers transaction data
Starting using your personalized merchant code same day
Collect payments from your apps and websites
Access to payment dashboard
Collect payments from your apps and websites
Reverse transactions
Retrieve all customers transaction data

faq.title: Do you have a sandbox where I can test your API?
faq.content: Yes, we have a testbed for you to test the API. Create an account and you will get the test credentials

faq.title: How do I receive the money paid by my customers?
faq.content: You will receive payout to your registered merchant mobile money account either automatically on a daily or weekly basis or  manually by withdrawing your money at any time to your registered number.

faq.title: Do I need a Merchant Mobile Money Account?
faq.content: Yes. You should have a merchant/retail mobile money account. Visit the operator’s mobile money office to register for an account if you don’t already have one.

faq.title: How long does it take for me to get my money (settlement)?
faq.content: For mobile money transactions, you get settled daily or weekly depending on your selection. If your business requires a more frequent settlement, kindly discuss with us for the possibility

faq.title: How much do you charge to integrate to the API?
faq.content: Integrate to our API is free of charge. You can create an account here

faq.title: How much do you charge to develop a USSD menu?
faq.content: It is free to onboard on the mobile money short code.

faq.title: How much do you charge to onboard on mobile money USSD?
faq.content: The price for developing your USSD menu depends on the complexity of your customer journey. We will be glad to discuss with you to find a suitable solution for your use case

faq.title: Do you charge any other fee/commission?
faq.content: There is 1.7% commission on every successful payment transaction you receive

faq.title: Do you charge for payout?
faq.content: Payout into your merchant account is free

faq.title: Does integrating your API give access to other countries?
faq.content: At this moment, our API gives you access to Benin and Togo mobile money ( MTN Benin, Moov Benin and Moov Togo)

faq.title: Do you offer transactions volume discounts ?
faq.content: Yes! Merchants who process large volumes can enjoy a discount on the commission on transaction volume. Please contact sales.

faq.title: Are you able to offer flat rate per transactions?
faq.content: Yeah, we offer flat rate per transaction to businesses such micro finance. In this scenario, we charge a flat fee per successful transaction. Kindly contact sales to discuss further

fr.Title: Une tarification simple et transparente
fr.description: Il vous suffit de choisir votre plan et de l'appliquer

pricingCard.point: paiement quotidien sur votre compte mobile money

USSD.point: Les frais d'installation dépendent de vos besoins

API.point: Pas de frais ou de charges cachés

USSD.Title: Détails de l'USSD
Lists: Recueillir des paiements à partir de n'importe quel type de téléphone sans Internet
Aucun développement requis pour le menu standard
Commencez à utiliser votre code marchand personnalisé le jour même
Récupérer toutes les données de transaction des clients
Commencez à utiliser votre code marchand personnalisé le jour même

API.Title: Détails de l'API
Lists: Collectez les paiements à partir de vos applications et sites web
Accès au tableau de bord des paiements

Transactions inversées
